Digital Garden is a content-first project meant to make it easier to write and curate content on the web.

## Getting Started

- Try out the [demo](https://johno.com/)
- Copy the starter from the [repo](https://github.com/johno/digital-garden/tree/master/site)

  ```
  git clone git@github.com:johno/digital-garden.git
  cp -r digital-garden/site new-site
  cd new-site
  npm install
  npm run-script build
  ```
